rules_text: When this creature enters, return up to one target creature or artifact to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: [i]The sea grants might to anyone who knows how to ask.[/i]
rules_text2: Up to one target artifact or creature you control becomes a 4/4 Kraken creature until end of turn. [i](Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)[/i]
